flawed_nl_solution:
The mother is 41 years old now, so 5 years ago she was 41-5=<<41-5=34>>34 years old
At that time the daughter's age was half hers so the daughter was 34/2=<<34/2=17>>17 years old
Now (5 years after that time) the daughter is 17+5=22 years old
In 3 years, the daughter will be 22+3=<<22+3=25>>25 years old
#### 25

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 36, not 34. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
